message.content:
1. Monday:
- Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with spinach and tomatoes, whole grain toast
- Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and balsamic vinaigrette
- Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and roasted vegetables (brussels sprouts, carrots, sweet potatoes)
2. Tuesday:
- Breakfast: Smoothie made with banana, spinach, almond milk, and chia seeds
- Lunch: Turkey and hummus wrap on a whole wheat tortilla with avocado, lettuce, and tomato
- Dinner: Stir-fry with tofu or tempeh, mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, onions), and brown rice
3. Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Overnight oats made with coconut milk, chia seeds, almond butter, and sliced banana
- Lunch: Tuna salad sandwich on a whole wheat bread with lettuce, tomato, and cucumber
- Dinner: Grilled chicken with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans
4. Thursday:
- Breakfast: Fruit salad with mixed berries, melon, and pineapple
- Lunch: Roasted vegetable and quinoa bowl with a lemon tahini dressing
- Dinner: Baked cod with sautéed kale and brown rice
5. Friday:
- Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with smoked salmon, whole grain toast, and sliced avocado
- Lunch: Chicken Caesar salad without croutons
- Dinner: Beef stir fry with mixed vegetables (mushrooms, zucchini, onions) and brown rice
6. Saturday:
- Breakfast: Green smoothie with spinach, pineapple, ginger, and coconut milk
- Lunch: Turkey and cheese roll-ups with whole wheat crackers and grapes
- Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with roasted vegetables (zucchini, red onion, bell pepper) and quinoa
7. Sunday:
- Breakfast: Whole grain pancakes with sliced banana and maple syrup
- Lunch: Chicken and vegetable soup without bread
- Dinner: Baked chicken breast with roasted potatoes and Brussels sprouts
